trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService" /> that was used prior to the current version.
trans-unit.target: 指出前一版使用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: When an assembly containing a new version of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> implementation is deployed, this attribute is applied to the new version of the tracking service class to identify the assembly of the previous version.
trans-unit.target: 部署包含新版本 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 實作的組件時，此屬性會套用至追蹤類別的新版本，以識別前一版的組件。

trans-unit.source: This allows the runtime to utilize the newer tracking service for workflows that were using persisted while using the previous version of the tracking service, but resumed after the new version was implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這可以讓執行階段運用較新的追蹤服務來處理在使用前一版追蹤服務時已保存，但在實作新版本之後繼續執行的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a fully qualified assembly name that identifies the previous version of the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含完整組件名稱，可識別前一版追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified assembly name of the previous version tracking service that this version replaces.
trans-unit.target: 取得此版本所取代之前一版追蹤服務的完整組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the fully qualified assembly name.
